posts.post_title: WTB:  Johnny Evers, Mordecai Brown & Frank Chance (Red) portraits
posts.post_content:
I am currently looking for the following Portraits with Sweet Caporal backs:

Johnny Evers -  SC150 & SC350
Frank Chance Red Portrait - SC150  & SC350
Mordecai Brown - SC350 Factory 25

I will take PSA, SGC or Raw, any condition (NO PAPER LOSS).

Please email me scans & price of what you would have available for sale.

[url]Stevea@tractorpartsasap.com[/url]

Thanks,
Steve
